verses.verse: נִדְרַ֙שְׁתִּי֙ <WH1875> nid-Rash-ti I am sought לְל֣וֹא <WH3808> le-Lo not שָׁאָ֔לוּ <WH7592> sha-'A-lu, of [them that] asked נִמְצֵ֖אתִי <WH4672> nim-Tze-ti [for me] I am found לְלֹ֣א <WH3808> le-Lo me not בִקְשֻׁ֑נִי <WH1245> vik-Shu-ni; of [them that] sought אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar-ti I said הִנֵּ֣נִי <WH2005> hin-Ne-ni behold הִנֵּ֔נִי <WH2005> hin-Ne-ni, behold אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about גּ֖וֹי <WH1471> Goy Behold me behold me unto a nation לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- did not קֹרָ֥א <WH7121> ko-Ra [that] was not called בִשְׁמִֽי׃ <WH8034> vish-Mi. by my name

פֵּרַ֧שְׂתִּי <WH6566> pe-Ras-ti I have spread out יָדַ֛י <WH3027> ya-Dai my hands כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom all the day אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about עַ֣ם <WH5971> 'am people סוֹרֵ֑ר <WH5637> so-Rer; unto a rebellious הַהֹלְכִים֙ <WH1980> ha-ho-le-Chim which walketh הַדֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> had-De-rech in a way לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- is not ט֔וֹב <WH2896> Tov, [that was] not good אַחַ֖ר <WH310> 'a-Char after מַחְשְׁבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4284> mach-she-vo-tei-Hem. their own thoughts

הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, A people הַמַּכְעִיסִ֥ים <WH3707> ham-mach-'i-Sim that provoketh me to anger אוֹתִ֛י <WH853> o-Ti עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and פָּנַ֖י <WH6440> pa-Nai to my face תָּמִ֑יד <WH8548> ta-Mid; continually זֹֽבְחִים֙ <WH2076> zoe-Chim that sacrificeth בַּגַּנּ֔וֹת <WH1593> bag-gan-Not, in gardens וּֽמְקַטְּרִ֖ים <WH6999> u-me-kat-te-Rim and burneth incense עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַלְּבֵנִֽים׃ <WH3843> hal-le-ve-Nim. upon altars of brick

הַיֹּֽשְׁבִים֙ <WH3427> hai-yo-she-Vim Which remain בַּקְּבָרִ֔ים <WH6913> bak-ke-va-Rim, among the graves וּבַנְּצוּרִ֖ים <WH5341> u-van-ne-tzu-Rim in the monuments יָלִ֑ינוּ <WH3885> ya-Li-nu; and lodge הָאֹֽכְלִים֙ <WH398> ha-'o-che-Lim which eat בְּשַׂ֣ר <WH1320> be-Sar flesh הַחֲזִ֔יר <WH2386> ha-cha-Zir, swine's; וּפְרַק u-fe-rak כוּמְרַ֥ק <WH6564> u-me-Rak broth קפִּגֻּלִ֖ים <WH6292> pig-gu-Lim of abominable כְּלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3627> ke-lei-Hem. [things is in] their vessels

הָאֹֽמְרִים֙ <WH559> ha-'o-me-Rim Which say קְרַ֣ב <WH7126> ke-Rav Stand אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha, about אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּגַּשׁ־ <WH5066> tig-gash- by thyself come not near בִּ֖י bi כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki For קְדַשְׁתִּ֑יךָ <WH6942> ke-dash-Ti-cha; to me for I am holier אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These עָשָׁ֣ן <WH6227> 'a-Shan than thou These [are] a smoke בְּאַפִּ֔י <WH639> be-'ap-Pi, in my nose אֵ֥שׁ <WH784> 'esh a fire יֹקֶ֖דֶת <WH3344> yo-Ke-det that burneth כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> hai-Yom. all the day

הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold כְתוּבָ֖ה <WH3789> che-tu-Vah Behold [it is] written לְפָנָ֑י <WH6440> le-fa-Nai; before לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo I will not אֶחֱשֶׂה֙ <WH2814> 'e-che-Seh me I will not keep silence כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אִם־ <WH518> 'im- but שִׁלַּ֔מְתִּי <WH7999> shil-Lam-ti, but will recompense וְשִׁלַּמְתִּ֖י <WH7999> ve-shil-lam-Ti even recompense עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- into חֵיקָֽם׃ <WH2436> chei-Kam. into their bosom

עֲ֠וֹנֹתֵיכֶם <WH5771> 'A-vo-no-tei-chem Your iniquities וַעֲוֹנֹ֨ת <WH5771> va-'a-vo-Not and the iniquities אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֤ם <WH1> a-vo-tei-Chem of your fathers יַחְדָּו֙ <WH3162> yach-Dav together אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Because קִטְּרוּ֙ <WH6999> kit-te-Ru which have burned incense עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הֶ֣הָרִ֔ים <WH2022> he-ha-Rim, upon the mountains וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- on הַגְּבָע֖וֹת <WH1389> hag-ge-va-'ot me upon the hills חֵרְפ֑וּנִי <WH2778> che-re-Fu-ni; and blasphemed וּמַדֹּתִ֧י <WH4058> u-mad-do-Ti therefore will I measure פְעֻלָּתָ֛ם <WH6468> fe-'ul-la-Tam work רִֽאשֹׁנָ֖ה <WH7223> ri-sho-Nah their former; עַל־ 'al- כאֶל־ <WH5921> 'el- and חֵיקָֽם׃ <WH413> chei-Kam. about קס sa-Mek

כֹּ֣ה׀ <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after יִמָּצֵ֤א <WH4672> yim-ma-Tze is found הַתִּירוֹשׁ֙ <WH8492> hat-ti-ro-Vosh As the new wine בָּֽאֶשְׁכּ֔וֹל <WH811> ba-'esh-Kol, in the cluster וְאָמַר֙ <WH559> ve-'a-Mar and [one] saith אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תַּשְׁחִיתֵ֔הוּ <WH7843> tash-chi-Te-hu, Destroy כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki there בְרָכָ֖ה <WH1293> ve-ra-Chah it not for a blessing בּ֑וֹ bo; כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> ken So אֶֽעֱשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> 'e-'e-Seh [is] in it so will I do לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an behalf עֲבָדַ֔י <WH5650> 'a-va-Dai, for my servants' לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> le-vil-Ti not הַֽשְׁחִ֥ית <WH7843> hash-Chit sakes that I may not destroy הַכֹּֽל׃ <WH3605> hak-Kol. all

וְהוֹצֵאתִ֤י <WH3318> ve-ho-tze-Ti And I will bring forth מִֽיַּעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> mi-ya-'a-Ko out of Jacob זֶ֔רַע <WH2233> Ze-ra', a seed וּמִיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> u-mi-hu-Dah and out of Judah יוֹרֵ֣שׁ <WH3423> yo-Resh an inheritor הָרָ֑י <WH2022> ha-Rai; of my mountains וִירֵשׁ֣וּהָ <WH3423> vi-re-Shu-ha shall inherit בְחִירַ֔י <WH972> ve-chi-Rai, and mine elect וַעֲבָדַ֖י <WH5650> va-'a-va-Dai it and my servants יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <WH7931> yish-ke-nu- shall dwell שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> Sham-mah. there

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become הַשָּׁרוֹן֙ <WH8289> hash-sha-rOn And Sharon לִנְוֵה־ <WH5116> lin-veh- shall be a fold צֹ֔אן <WH6629> Tzon, of flocks וְעֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> ve-'E-mek and the valley עָכ֖וֹר <WH5911> a-Chor of Achor לְרֵ֣בֶץ <WH7258> le-Re-vetz to lie down in בָּקָ֑ר <WH1241> ba-Kar; a place for the herds לְעַמִּ֖י <WH5971> le-'am-Mi for my people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who דְּרָשֽׁוּנִי׃ <WH1875> de-ra-Shu-ni. that have sought

וְאַתֶּם֙ <WH859> ve-'at-Tem who עֹזְבֵ֣י <WH5800> 'o-ze-Vei But ye [are] they that forsake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD הַשְּׁכֵחִ֖ים <WH7911> hash-she-che-Chim cause to forget אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַ֣ר <WH2022> har mountain קָדְשִׁ֑י <WH6944> kod-shi my holy הַֽעֹרְכִ֤ים <WH6186> ha-'o-re-Chim that prepare לַגַּד֙ <WH1409> lag-Gad Fortune שֻׁלְחָ֔ן <WH7979> shul-Chan, a table וְהַֽמְמַלְאִ֖ים <WH4390> ve-ham-mal-'Im and that furnish לַמְנִ֥י <WH4507> lam-Ni unto that number מִמְסָֽךְ׃ <WH4469> mi-Sach. the drink offering

וּמָנִ֨יתִי <WH4487> u-ma-Ni-ti Therefore will I number אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> 'et-Chem לַחֶ֗רֶב <WH2719> la-Che-rev, you to the sword וְכֻלְּכֶם֙ <WH3605> ve-chul-le-Chem and all לַטֶּ֣בַח <WH2874> lat-Te-vach to the slaughter תִּכְרָ֔עוּ <WH3766> tich-Ra-'u, and ye shall all bow down יַ֤עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an Because קָרָ֙אתִי֙ <WH7121> ka-Ra-ti because when I called וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo did not עֲנִיתֶ֔ם <WH6030> 'a-ni-Tem, ye did not answer דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti when I spake וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo did not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֑ם <WH8085> she-ma'-Tem; ye did not hear וַתַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> vat-ta-'a-Su but did הָרַע֙ <WH7451> ha-Ra' evil בְּעֵינַ֔י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nai, before mine eyes וּבַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> u-va-'a-Sher which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- did not חָפַ֖צְתִּי <WH2654> cha-Fatz-ti [that] wherein I delighted בְּחַרְתֶּֽם׃ <WH977> be-char-Tem. and did choose פ Peh

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore כֹּה־ <WH3541> koh- thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold עֲבָדַ֤י׀ <WH5650> 'a-va-Dai Behold my servants יֹאכֵ֙לוּ֙ <WH398> yo-Che-lu shall eat וְאַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> ve-'at-Tem you תִּרְעָ֔בוּ <WH7456> tir-'A-vu, but ye shall be hungry הִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold עֲבָדַ֛י <WH5650> 'a-va-Dai behold my servants יִשְׁתּ֖וּ <WH8354> yish-Tu shall drink וְאַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> ve-'at-Tem you תִּצְמָ֑אוּ <WH6770> titz-Ma-'u; but ye shall be thirsty הִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold עֲבָדַ֛י <WH5650> 'a-va-Dai behold my servants יִשְׂמָ֖חוּ <WH8055> yis-Ma-chu shall rejoice וְאַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> ve-'at-Tem you תֵּבֹֽשׁוּ׃ <WH954> te-Vo-shu. but ye shall be ashamed

הִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold עֲבָדַ֛י <WH5650> 'a-va-Dai Behold my servants יָרֹ֖נּוּ <WH7442> ya-Ron-nu shall sing מִטּ֣וּב <WH2898> mit-Tuv for joy לֵ֑ב <WH3820> Lev; of heart וְאַתֶּ֤ם <WH859> ve-'at-Tem you תִּצְעֲקוּ֙ <WH6817> titz-'a-Ku but ye shall cry מִכְּאֵ֣ב <WH3511> mik-ke-'Ev for sorrow לֵ֔ב <WH3820> Lev, of heart וּמִשֵּׁ֥בֶר <WH7667> u-mish-She-ver for vexation ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach of spirit תְּיֵלִֽילוּ׃ <WH3213> te-ye-Li-lu. and shall howl

וְהִנַּחְתֶּ֨ם <WH3240> ve-hin-nach-Tem And ye shall leave שִׁמְכֶ֤ם <WH8034> shim-Chem your name לִשְׁבוּעָה֙ <WH7621> lish-vu-'Ah for a curse לִבְחִירַ֔י <WH972> liv-chi-Rai, unto my chosen וֶהֱמִיתְךָ֖ <WH4191> ve-he-mi-te-Cha shall slay אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai for the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; GOD וְלַעֲבָדָ֥יו <WH5650> ve-la-'a-va-Dav his servants יִקְרָ֖א <WH7121> yik-Ra thee and call שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> shem name אַחֵֽר׃ <WH312> 'a-Cher. by another

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Because הַמִּתְבָּרֵ֜ךְ <WH1288> ham-mit-ba-Rech That he who blesseth בָּאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz, himself in the earth יִתְבָּרֵךְ֙ <WH1288> yit-ba-reCh shall bless בֵּאלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> be-lo-Hei himself in the God אָמֵ֔ן <WH543> 'a-Men, of truth וְהַנִּשְׁבָּ֣ע <WH7650> ve-han-nish-Ba' and he that sweareth בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz, in the earth יִשָּׁבַ֖ע <WH7650> yish-sha-Va' shall swear בֵּאלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> be-lo-Hei by the God אָמֵ֑ן <WH543> 'a-Men; of truth כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki Because נִשְׁכְּח֗וּ <WH7911> nish-ke-Chu, are forgotten הַצָּרוֹת֙ <WH6869> hatz-tza-rOt troubles הָרִ֣אשֹׁנ֔וֹת <WH7223> ha-Ri-sho-Not, because the former וְכִ֥י <WH3588> ve-Chi and because נִסְתְּר֖וּ <WH5641> nis-te-Ru and because they are hid מֵעֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> me-'ei-Nai. from mine eyes

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold בוֹרֵ֛א <WH1254> vo-Re For behold I create שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim heavens חֲדָשִׁ֖ים <WH2319> cha-da-Shim new וָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> va-'A-retz earth חֲדָשָׁ֑ה <WH2319> cha-da-Shah; and a new וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo not תִזָּכַ֙רְנָה֙ <WH2142> tiz-za-Char-nah shall not be remembered הָרִ֣אשֹׁנ֔וֹת <WH7223> ha-Ri-sho-Not, and the former וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo or תַעֲלֶ֖ינָה <WH5927> ta-'a-Lei-nah nor come עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> Lev. into mind כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אִם־ <WH518> 'im- but

שִׂ֤ישׂוּ <WH7797> Si-su But be ye glad וְגִ֙ילוּ֙ <WH1523> ve-Gi-lu and rejoice עֲדֵי־ <WH5703> 'a-dei- for ever עַ֔ד <WH5704> 'Ad, in אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher what אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I בוֹרֵ֑א <WH1254> vo-Re; [in that] which I create כִּי֩ <WH3588> ki for הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold בוֹרֵ֧א <WH1254> vo-Re for behold I create אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem גִּילָ֖ה <WH1525> gi-Lah a rejoicing וְעַמָּ֥הּ <WH5971> ve-'am-Mah and her people מָשֽׂוֹשׂ׃ <WH4885> ma-Sos. a joy

וְגַלְתִּ֥י <WH1523> ve-gal-Ti And I will rejoice בִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> vi-ru-sha-Lim in Jerusalem וְשַׂשְׂתִּ֣י <WH7797> ve-sas-Ti and joy בְעַמִּ֑י <WH5971> ve-'am-Mi; in my people וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- will no יִשָּׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> yish-sha-Ma' shall be no more heard בָּהּ֙ bah ע֔וֹד <WH5750> od, longer ק֥וֹל <WH6963> Kol and the voice בְּכִ֖י <WH1065> be-Chi of weeping וְק֥וֹל <WH6963> ve-Kol in her nor the voice זְעָקָֽה׃ <WH2201> ze-'a-Kah. of crying
